definition: to dislike/suspicion/resentment/enmity/abbr. for 嫌犯[xian2 fan4], criminal suspect

sentences.english: Everybody knows that qadaffi was working with the US to route out terror suspects.
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道，卡扎菲和美国合作抓捕恐怖嫌疑人。

sentences.english: Part of the crew headed that way in search of the suspect.
sentences.chinese: 部分组员前往那个方向搜寻嫌疑人。

sentences.english: The suspect, Gong Runbo, 33, grew up in the town.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪嫌疑人宫润伯现年33岁，本地人。

sentences.english: Prosecutors said none of the suspects got any real secrets.
sentences.chinese: 检察官称嫌疑人没有得到任何真正的秘密。

sentences.english: After the plane landed the three men were questioned and released.
sentences.chinese: 在飞机着陆后，这三名嫌疑人接受询问后被释放。

sentences.english: Criminal suspects are now protected from self-incrimination.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪嫌疑人现在受到自证其罪的保护。

sentences.english: The inspector was able to put his finger on the weak point in the suspect's alibi.
sentences.chinese: 检察官能准确指出嫌疑人辩辞中的弱点。

sentences.english: The police will summon the suspects for questioning.
sentences.chinese: 警方将强制拘传这几名犯罪嫌疑人。

sentences.english: Check via the platoon, police was carried out independently to another suspect land capture.
sentences.chinese: 经排查，警方对另一嫌疑人陆自立实施了抓捕。

sentences.english: The suspected offenders involved in a same case shall be interrogated separately.
sentences.chinese: 讯问同案的违法嫌疑人，应当个别进行。

sentences.english: She was the only one granted bail.
sentences.chinese: 她是惟一一个准予保释的嫌疑人。

sentences.english: High-speed police chases are dramatic, dangerous and often deadly.
sentences.chinese: 警察高速驾车追捕嫌疑人是危险的，常常也是致命的。

sentences.english: The police found a Browing from the suspect.
sentences.chinese: 警察在犯罪嫌疑人身上搜出了勃朗宁。

sentences.english: Florida investigators are looking for one or more arson suspects linked to several wildfires burning across central portion of the state.
sentences.chinese: 佛罗里达州的调查官员正在搜寻纵火案嫌疑人。

sentences.english: Each suspect was then told to place his hand through the curtain and touch the bell.
sentences.chinese: 这时，每一个嫌疑人都被要求透过布帘去用手摸神钟。

sentences.english: Wu suspects gave police the statement of the cold body.
sentences.chinese: 嫌疑人吴某的供述还让民警出了身冷汗。

definition: civil police/PRC police/abbr. for 人民警察
(of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
to make a full confession/to plead guilty
to deploy surveillance/to put under surveillance
to be at large (of a criminal)
to bring to justice/to file away (a document)
